user_query: I want to obtain a verified healthcare mailing list and guidelines for conducting a successful healthcare conference.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a verified mailing list of healthcare professionals.
required_inputs: specific criteria for healthcare professionals (e.g., specialties, locations)

TaskList.description: Create an invite email template that can be used to send out the mailing list invitations.
Provide guidelines and best practices for conducting a successful healthcare conference.
required_inputs: research on successful healthcare conference elements (speakers, topics, logistics)

TaskList.description: Send the invite email to the compiled mailing list from Subtask 1 using the template from Subtask 2.
